thread.title: COP21: Parliament's roadmap for Paris UN climate talks (European Parliament)

author: wn.com
title: COP21: Parliament's roadmap for Paris UN climate talks (European Parliament)
text: ( Source : European Parliament ) The EU and its member states must call for a 40% cut in greenhouse gas emissions by 2030 and scale up climate finance commitments at the COP21 UN climate talks in Paris , Parliament said on Wednesday. MEPs also
